artist: Urakami Shunkin; Kikuchi Gozan; Aone Kyūkō; Ueno Setsugaku; Ikeda Unshō; Yamamoto Chikuun; Taigadō Teiryo; Tomitori Hōsai; Tanomura Chokunyū
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
life_date: Urakami Shunkin, Japanese, 1779–1846; Kikuchi Gozan, Japanese, 1769–1849; Aone Kyūkō, Japanese, 1805–1854; Ueno Setsugaku, Japanese, 1819–1894; Ikeda Unshō, Japanese, 1825–1886; Yamamoto Chikuun, Japanese, 1820–1888; Taigadō Teiryo, Japanese, 1840–1910; Tomitori Hōsai, Japanese, 1808–1880; Tanomura Chokunyū, Japanese, 1814–1907
medium: Ink and color on paper and silk
title: Album with Paintings and Calligraphy
